message: Enhanced PSML-related release notes and reviewed the rest of the document
Change communicator names for slk/elpa
Fix bug in smpbz (taking into account shiftk was incorrect)
Merge branch 'release-8.6.1' of gitlab:trunk/abinit into release-8.6.1
Add E. Bousquet sections to release notes
Update release notes and minor fixes in the list of contributors
Change convention for the calculation of J in cRPA: The new convention is coherent with the definition of jpawu in DFT+U calculations in ABINIT.
Update references for tests v7/25 78 79 (cRPA)
Change typo in crpa tutorial
